thread.title: BRIEF-Aratana Therapeutics Expands Therapeutic Candidate Pipeline

title: BRIEF-Aratana Therapeutics Expands Therapeutic Candidate Pipeline
text: March 1, 2018 / 1:48 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Aratana Therapeutics Expands Therapeutic Candidate Pipeline Reuters Staff March 1 (Reuters) - Aratana Therapeutics Inc: * ARATANA THERAPEUTICS EXPANDS THERAPEUTIC CANDIDATE PIPELINE * ARATANA THERAPEUTICS INC - ANNOUNCED AN ANIMAL HEALTH RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT COLLABORATION WITH ASKAT INC * ARATANA THERAPEUTICS INC - LICENSED EXCLUSIVE, WORLDWIDE RIGHTS TO DEVELOP AND COMMERCIALIZE AT-019, KNOWN AS AAT-008 BY ASKAT * ARATANA THERAPEUTICS INC - AT-019 LICENSE AGREEMENT INCLUDES AN UPFRONT PAYMENT OF $0.5 MILLION; MILESTONE PAYMENTS OF UP TO $15.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon:
